}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Mi Router Redmi
{{See also|List of Xiaomi Wireless Devices}}
===Specifications=== *[[Xiaomi Mi Router Redmi AX6E (AX6000)]] (RB06) • [https://www.acwifi.net/19676.html ''AC|WiFi''] (CN) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986A @2.0GHz (''Filogic 830'') • [https://www.acwifi.net/19656.html ''AC|WiFi''] (CN) :MT7986AV @2.0GHz (DDR3/DDR4), MT7986BV @1.6GHz (DDR3) :Flash: [[ESMT]] F50L1G41LB-104I - 128MB (SPI NAND) :RAM: [[Samsung]] K4A4G165WF-BCWE - 512MB (DDR4 3200MHz) :WiFi: [[MediaTek]] MT7976AN/MT7986A - 5GHz RF ”IQ“, FEM 4xRTC66568 ::(Wi-Fi 6, 4x4 MIMO, BW 160MHz, 1024-QAM, 4804Mbps) :[[MediaTek]] MT7976GN/MT7986A - 2.4GHz RF ”IQ“, FEM 4x RTC66266 ::(Wi-Fi 6, 4x4 MIMO, BW 40MHz, 1024-QAM, 1147Mbps) :Switch: [[MediaTek]] MT7531AE (MT7531B HSGMII 2.5G PHY) :PCB: Mi MB06 - RB06-MB06-VER:0103 ([https://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/DSC_4905.jpg PCB])
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.acwifi.net/19676.html ''Xiaomi Redmi AX6E AX6000'' on '''AC|WiFi''' blog] (''Teardown'') *[https://www.acwifi.net/19656.html ''Xiaomi Redmi AX6E AX6000'' on '''AC|WiFi''' blog] (''Filogic 830'') <!-- *[https://4pda.to/forum/index.php?showtopic=1033757 ''Xiaomi Redmi AX6S AX3200'' on '''4pda''' forums] -->
